name: WC Hero
description:
Have you ever found yourself in a mall, looking for the nearest toilet? Hank, the WC Hero knows exactly what that feels like!

Help save Hank from the oncoming crapocalypse, navigating him through a maze-like mall filled by a randomly generated crowd, making every run through the game different. Fart away to disperse the people blocking your way to the toilet and bring Hank some much needed relief to complete the game.

This game was created during Warsaw Film School's Game Jam III.
